Class NoDynamicContextException

java.lang.Object

              net.sf.saxon.trans.XPathException
                  net.sf.saxon.trans.NoDynamicContextException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NoDynamicContextException
extends XPathException

This exception class is used when early (compile-time) evaluation of an expression is attempted, and the expression requires knowledge of the current dateTime or implicit timezone. This exception should be caught internally, and should result in evaluation of the expression being deferred until run-time

See Also:
Serialized Form
